title: Client shut down randomly and gave me a leavebuster for 20 minutes
body:
I was in the middle of a teamfight and the game randomly went black screen, about 2 minutes later it closed completely and then proceeded to say it needed to update then restart the update right after it finished, no idea what's going on anymore 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Damn, it sounds pretty frustrating to suddenly get a black screen during a team fight.  This black screen could be suggesting a more serious issue, though, as if something with your hardware or game failed to render the files and resulted in that.  To start off, I suggest going over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure both your drivers and game files are doing okay.  Test it out in a custom game to be sure.  I hope that helps!
